review: So glad to have  found a 4 pack of these at a good price. They want a mini fortune just for 1 in stores. We are in a custody battle and I use these to separate the important info the lawyer/judge need to see. I was having to write the name/what it contained on a pc of paper and tape it to the front of our plain/reg binders. Now I can print off a better looking sheet to place in front. My daughter also uses these for high school classes. Since she cant doodle on anything else, she draws/writes on paper and places in the front which she loves.
productTitle: Avery Economy View Binder with 2-Inch Round Ring, White, Pack Of 4 (19202)
